links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,10
mathematica: f[n_]:=Module[{n1=2^2^n,n2=3^2^n},n1 n2-n1-n2]; f/@Range[0,7]  (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Apr 04 2011 *)
prog: (PARI) { for (n=0, 10, p=2^n; w=2^p; h=3^p; write("b061063.txt", n, " ", w*h - w - h) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 17 2009](MAGMA) [6^(2^n) - 2^(2^n) - 3^(2^n): n in [0..12]]; // Vincenzo Librandi, Apr 05 2011
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), May 27 2001
